name: Hellbearer: The Deepening
description:
When a corpse is evil, and we mean EVIL, it’s best to bury it as deep as you can. HELLBEARERs are elite body burying robots tasked with putting bad guys in the ground.

left/right arrow keys to move
spacebar to dig

Featuring art by NewQuinn (https://www.youtube.com/user/NewQuinnProductions) and music by johnzo
